name: FB Wall Manager
short_description:
This is a userscript system to be used with "Grease Monkey".

It is used to automate the collection of bonuses from various Facebook games through the use of "sidekicks".

Sidekicks dock to the main script to control which posts to process.

Note: Code repository is currently disable due to UN-usability for our needs...
